entry.title: 'Pair Trading'
entry.content:
• R
  • Gitlab CI/CD
  • DVC
  • Scala
  • Javascript showInProjects: true

Web application built for pair trading in the US Equity market. It is built on top of concepts from statistical arbitrage theory.

entry.title: 'Quantitative Analyst'
entry.content: • The team was tasked with building a Trading platform for Pair Trading in the US equity market, and I was tasked with research & implementation of a statistical model for building intraday strategy & write an API to seamlessly publish new models into the app middle-tier.
